attributes.action: Take action to deal with the growing menace caused by urban gull populations.
attributes.additional_details: See Peter Rock's research and various media reports.
attributes.background:
Gull behaviour has changed rapidly in the past 50 years and urban populations of the birds have expanded rapidly.
Noise,mess,aggression and damage to property are causing misery for thousands of people.
The legal protection currently afforded to gulls should be withdrawn.
